segments.text: Yes.May I have some more beer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sure . I'll be back in a minute.Thank you for waiting . Here it is.Did you enjoy your meal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the meal was very delicious and I enjoyed very much . I'm full .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that so ? I'm glad you enjoyed it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , Miss.Where is the toilet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Toilets are in the rear . I'm afraid all the toilets are fully occupied at the moment .
segments.speaker: S1
